name: Zombie Revenge (itch)
description:
This time the zombie will kill human !!!

Zombie Revenge is a game i made for my youtube channel for fun hope you like it.

Download & install instructions :

Just unzip the fille, and run the application, have fun.

How to play :

- Left click to spawn zombie.

- Right click to spawn skelton.

- Use bloood and bones for upgrades.
